name: altered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
changed; different: She said her life was drastically altered. I've given a slightly altered baking time in this recipe. Everything seemed altered when I returned.
US (UK neutered) (of an animal) having had part of its sexual organs removed, so that it cannot produce young animals: The permit costs $9 for an altered dog or cat and $50 for an unaltered dog or cat. Tenants may keep pets but they must be altered and fully vaccinated.
